Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Booster Croptop^reset; to ^orange;Kevin^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

I need to dress a pleasure doll to look exactly like ^green;a coworkers mother^reset;... Can you make me a ^orange;Booster Croptop^reset;? in a ^green;Sewing Wheel^reset;? I suck at sewing, and I'll pay you. Shh!

Texts.Chs: 哈哈，步骤二已完成！还有，谢谢你的帮忙！他肯定永远都猜不到是我搞的鬼！
Texts.Eng: Now for phase two! Thanks for the help. He'll never see it coming!
